tags.name: kemet-scroll-snap
tags.description: A scroll-snap implementation for responsive sliders.

properties.name: axis
properties.description: Determines the direction the component flows

properties.name: pagination
properties.description: Detrmines where to display the paginator.

properties.name: isTouchDevice
properties.description: Is set if touch capibilities are detected.

properties.name: slides
properties.description: An array of objects containing info about the slides.

properties.name: paginationIcon
properties.description: An ascii symbol to use for the pagination pages.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-scroll-snap-gap
cssProperties.description: Space between the slides. Default is: 0.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-scroll-snap-pagination-color
cssProperties.description: Color of the paginator pages. Default is: #007dc1.)

cssProperties.name: --kemet-scroll-snap-pagination-size
cssProperties.description: Size of the paginator pages. Default is: 4rem.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-scroll-snap-pagination-shadow
cssProperties.description: Shadow of the paginator pages. Default is: 1px 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.5)

cssProperties.name: --kemet-scroll-snap-pagination-gap
cssProperties.description: Space between the paginator pages. Default is: 0.5rem.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-scroll-snap-pagination-topoffset
cssProperties.description: Top offset of the paginator pages. Default is: -2.5rem.

properties.name: focused
properties.description: Is true when the slide is fully visible in it's container.

cssProperties.name: --kememt-scroll-snap-slide-width
cssProperties.description: The width of the slide. Default is: 100%.

cssProperties.name: --kemet-scroll-snap-slide-align
cssProperties.description: The scroll-snap alignment. Default is: center.)
